question: You have just returned home from a holiday and have received photographs from a friend who was on holiday with you.Write to your frind thanking them for the photographs. You should include:-a description of the photos-the most memorable thing about the holiday-invite them to come and stay with you
text: Hope you and your family doing amazing.I am writing to let you know I just received the pictures from my vacation in Bei Ying ,The  capital of China.

I am really in love with the photo that you send  to me .It's the scenes at the Forbidden City and It just looks moreover bring out a lot of wonderful memories.I  never thought that I'd dare to wake up at 5am just to visit the Forbidden City .
I also remember the night market we visited together, the food there is so delicious and when we finish we still want to take away some for supper.the foodseller is also so friendly.
In exchange, I'd like to invite you to come to Penang, the second capital of Malaysia  next summer holiday. Just stay back and relax ,you are required to prepare nothing .I will arrange all for you.
